title: RULE APPROVAL – HOUSE REVENUE AND TAXATION COMMITTEE – States findings of the Legislature and provides that all temporary and pending rules of the Idaho State Tax Commission have been reviewed and approved by the House Revenue and Taxation Committee.
subject: COMMISSIONS
RULES
TAX AND TAXATION
